title.narrative: Harmonisation and Capacity Building for Green Finance in Belt and Road Investments

description.narrative: This project supports greening the Belt and Road Initiative, with a focus on China’s two most promising approaches – the Green Investment Principles (GIP) and the Green Development Guidance for BRI Projects (GDG, aka “Green Light System”), coupled with capacity building for financial institutions engaged in overseas investments.
